name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 24, Zhengzhou, Henan. Homeowners of Shenglong Tianhui No. 9 reported that due to the temporary power supply in the community, frequent power outages and the recent high temperatures have brought great inconvenience to the lives of residents. That night, the owners gathered downstairs to protest and sang the national anthem to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the early morning of July 25, a strong stench suddenly spread throughout Lanzhou, Gansu, waking up many citizens. Some netizens said they heard an explosion.
The cause is currently unknown.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 25, the news that "many universities have decided to extend the duration of graduate studies" became a hot topic, sparking heated discussions among netizens. Netizens responded with "all means to ease employment pressure" and "graduate students cannot find jobs due to age constraints after graduation."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The five major banks lowered their deposit interest rates to bid farewell to the 2-digit range.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 23, a woman in Shanghai (published IP) posted a video saying she was going to sue her biological parents, "They arranged three marriages for me from the age of 14 to 20, and they are still trying every way to destroy me." The woman also said that her family had always wanted a boy, "They gave birth to seven, threw away two, and gave away four."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 24, Rizhao, Shandong. A summer job student exposed a seafood restaurant that recycled leftovers, processed them and then sold them. When Mr. Quan (pseudonym), a college student, worked in this seafood restaurant during the summer vacation, he found that the kitchen hygiene was particularly poor, and that the restaurant would recycle the leftover seafood from customers and make it into pimple soup and continue to sell it the next day. He hated this behavior so he exposed it. It is reported that the seafood restaurant is still in business after changing its name, and the summer job worker's account has been cancelled.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 18, Dalian, Liaoning. Netizens posted a video saying that a vehicle with the word "court" on it repeatedly crossed the solid line and cut off other vehicles. The whole process was captured by a dashcam, and the local traffic police said: We will transfer the case.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Xiamen, Fujian, a blogger filmed a policeman enforcing the law and was taken away after being warned three times. On July 19, the blogger filmed a police car illegally parked again, and the driver was not wearing a seat belt. When Bo Zhi questioned him, the man sitting in the driver's seat of the police car closed the window. On July 23, the staff of the local Discipline Inspection and Supervision Office called back: the auxiliary policeman had been criticized and educated, and in order to avoid affecting the overall image of the police, the blogger was hoped to delete the video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 24, a 16-year-old female high school student in Zibo, Shandong Province, posted a message saying that she was cheated by Cao Yue, a teacher at Shandong University of Technology, who cheated on her during marriage. After the two sides confirmed their relationship, the girl gave Cao Yue luxury goods, cigarettes, and health products. The girl said that she had checked into a hotel with Cao Yue twice and had sex with him twice. The girl paid for both bookings and was threatened by Cao Yue after reporting the incident.
On July 25, the official blog of Shandong University of Technology released a report: Teacher Cao was expelled from the party and dismissed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, many places in Liaoning have carried out the centralized collection of basic information of "one standard and three realities". Community grid workers and police officers will verify the information of each household in the jurisdiction by visiting households, making phone calls, filling out forms, etc. Residents need to prepare household registration books, ID cards, house ownership certificates and other relevant information of residents in advance.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 25, Hangzhou, Zhejiang. A ride-hailing driver posted a video saying that his Alpha S sedan, which he had just bought two months ago, suddenly broke down during normal driving. The first thing the manufacturer did after arriving was not to appease the owner or check for hidden dangers in the vehicle, but to violently remove the car logo, saying: At most, I will pay you money.
Alpha S customer service: Hangzhou specialists have followed up with the user, and the logo removal incident is under investigation. As of now, Alpha S has closed the account comment area.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 24, the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs announced that this year's summer grain output hit a new historical high, which triggered ridicule and doubts from netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a ticket from Shenzhen City circulated online showed that someone was fined 2,000 yuan by traffic police for driving an electric bicycle while drunk, and his electric bicycle was confiscated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 24, the National Business Daily reported: Chow Tai Fook closed 180 stores in the mainland in the past six months, and its retail sales in April-June this year decreased by 20% year-on-year. During the opening of the market on July 24, Chow Tai Fook's stock price fell by 7.7% at one point, hitting a new low since September 2020.
